rules_text:
When Pursuer of Divinity enters, you may search your library for a double-faced card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Cybersoul {4}{W}{B} [i]({4}{W}{B}: Transform this. Each artifact you tap while activating pays for {1}. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Flying, vigilance, deathtouch
Whenever Abandoner of Flesh or another transformed permanent you control dies, return that card to the battlefield. [i](It returns untransformed.)[/i]
